title: Where to find all nymphs in Honkai: Star Rail
description: Honkai: Star Rail’s 3.0 update added a new type of scavenger hunt to the game: nymphs in Amphoreus. These critters are scattered around the maps, with each map featuring a “Garmentmaker” looking to find them. Help the “Garmentmaker” out and you’ll be able to get Stellar Jade and other goodies for yoru time. These little […]
author: Julia Lee
excerpt: Find all the beetles and butterflies in Amphoreus
text: Honkai: Star Rail’s 3.0 update added a new type of scavenger hunt to the game: nymphs in Amphoreus. These critters are scattered around the maps, with each map featuring a “Garmentmaker” looking to find them. Help the “Garmentmaker” out and you’ll be able to get Stellar Jade and other goodies for yoru time.These little bugs work similarly to the origami birds from Penacony. There are a bunch of them scattered around the map, and once you find them, you’ll need to report to the “Garmentmaker” in each area to get your reward. If you don’t know which nymphs you’re missing from the map, you can trade Memory Crystal Shards in exchange for a hint on where one of the missing nymphs is. (However, if you use our guide, you shouldn’t have to do this, and you can use your shards on loot from Janus’ Steed in Okhema instead.)These bugs are also chatty, so if you’re having a hard time finding them, you can keep your eyes peeled for text bubbles that will show up, as they seem to have a lot to say.Unlike the origami birds, finding nymphs doesn’t reward you with light cones. Instead, you get Celestial Ambrosia, which you’ll need to rank up the Tidal Bounty in the Vortex of Genesis. There are also additional puzzles that you can complete once you get the nymphs in specific areas (and we’ll detail that, too).Below, we list where to find all nymphs in Amphoreus with both a map and a description of where to look.Update (Jan. 28): We’ve updated this guide with further rewards for obtaining all the nymphs.Table of Contents‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema nymph locations‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locations‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema nymph locationsThere are 20 nymphs total in Okhema, and they look like butterflies. Once you find all 20, you’ll get a text from Aglaea to return to the “Garmentmaker.” You’ll get Stellar Jade and Celestial Ambrosia for finding them.After collecting all 20, the “Garmentmaker” will move near the elevator, pointing you towards a puzzle that reward you with a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Golden Journey.” You’ll need to use the fountains in Okhema to solve the nymph’s secret message.‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Palace F2Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the “Garmentmaker.”On some flowery bushes.Blending in to the butterfly mural on the wall.At the top of the ramp on the curved structure above.‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Palace F1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseLaying on the center water fountain.Sitting upright on a chair.Sleeping in the towels by your bath.On the edge of the stage.On the potted plant on the table. It’ll fly away to another pot and you’ll need to catch it a few times.On the walls of the lift. You may need to take it up and down a few times to grab it, but the final spot will be at the top of the lift.Hiding among the stuffed seals on the shelf.Flying above the pool.‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Market F2Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseIn the prayer fountain.In a basket on the edge of the building.‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Market F1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the golden wall structure.On the forge inside the smithy.High up on the pillar.Inside the dinosaur’s feeder.On the guard’s head.On the bell at the Droma’s station.‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locationsThere are 20 nymphs in the “Bloodbathed Battlefront” and they’re depicted as red-orange beetles. Once you find all 20, you’ll get a text from Aglaea. For your troubles, you’ll get the “Portentous Goldwoven: Bloodbathed Battlefront” quest item, Stellar Jades, and Celestial Ambrosia.After collecting all 20 nymphs in this area, the aforementioned quest item will give you hints about getting the precious chest for this area. You’ll need to walk forward towards the center of the round 3D room on B1 at dawn. (It’s a little fiddly, so you may need to walk a bit or try backing up and walking in again.) If done correctly, a nymph will appear, asking you a question — to which you should answer “Four warriors,” to get the chest and the “Chirping Secret: Blemish of Light” achievement.‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos F2Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the wall in the room with the two enemies.On the edge of the walkway.On the edge of the walkway.On the wall decor.On the walls. We used a ranged character to hit the structures to reveal the critter.On top of the large sword structure in the area. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.On the ledge above the pathway.On the ground in front of the ball. We accidentally squashed it with the ball, which counted as collecting it, but we’re not sure if you have to squash it to collect it.‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos F1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseAt the entrance of the area behind the doorway to “Strife Ruins.”In the fire (ouch!).Rolling a ball up the side of the steps.On the edge of the ornamental structure.On the pile of blue cubes.On the edge of the platform.On the edge overlooking the area.By the boxes on the ground.High up on the wall. This one actually gets captured by a Spirithief.‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos B1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the curved structure above the path.Sitting on the sword of the giant statue. Use the floating hand mechanism to grab it.Standing next to the hidden passage machine.‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locationsThere are 20 nymphs in the “Strife Ruins” and they appear as blue beetles. Once you find them, you’ll get Stellar Jade, the “Portentous Goldwoven: Strife Ruins” item, and Celestial Ambrosia.Once you have all 20 nymphs, you can head to the Kremnos Arena (the northern part within the huge circle on F2), and walk forward into the arena. (Just like the Bloodbathed Battlefront instance, it may be fiddly, so you may need to try multiple times to walk in to the area.) If done correctly, a nymph will appear at the north of the map, asking you a question. Answer “13 flames” and you’ll get a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Fleetfoot Paradox.”‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F3Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the wall.‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F2Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseIn the pile of boxes.Attack the shields on the wall to get this nymph.On the railing.On the edge of the structure.On the lip of the bowl-like decor.On the mural.‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the wall carving.Near the rubble.Overlooking the edge of the chain bridge.On the sword in the base.On the floor.Very high up on a light fixture. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.At the top of the center structure.Next to the space anchor.‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos B1Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseIn the fire.On the door.On the floor.On the blue light fixture.On the round structure. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locationsThere are 10 nymphs in the Janusopolis and they appear as teal beetles. Once you find them all, you’ll get Stellar Jade, the “Portentous Goldwoven: Abyss of Fate” item, and Celestial Ambrosia.After grabbing all the nymphs, the quest item you get will reveal a fourth of the puzzle solution for the tablet in the southeast corner of Janusopolis F2. Once you correctly input the solution to the “Crrk?” prophecy tablet, you’ll get a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Many-Faced.”‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locations F2Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseOn the broken pillar (evernight).On the wall (evernight).On the bridge (dawn).On the edge of the path.Under the pillar on the ground.On the left scale (dawn).On the floor (dawn).In the back compartment behind the right scale on the third floor (dawn).On the top of the center part of the scales. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.In the hood of the tall statue.After finding all the nymphs, you can return to the “Garmentmaker” in Okhema, but they won’t have any additional rewards for you at this time. They will be looking at the wall around the nearby lift, murmuring about the nymphs lining up to a hidden message, but as of this writing, we haven’t figured out what that means.
html:
Honkai: Star Rail’s 3.0 update added a new type of scavenger hunt to the game: nymphs in Amphoreus. These critters are scattered around the maps, with each map featuring a “Garmentmaker” looking to find them. Help the “Garmentmaker” out and you’ll be able to get Stellar Jade and other goodies for yoru time.

These little bugs work similarly to the origami birds from Penacony. There are a bunch of them scattered around the map, and once you find them, you’ll need to report to the “Garmentmaker” in each area to get your reward. If you don’t know which nymphs you’re missing from the map, you can trade Memory Crystal Shards in exchange for a hint on where one of the missing nymphs is. (However, if you use our guide, you shouldn’t have to do this, and you can use your shards on loot from Janus’ Steed in Okhema instead.)

These bugs are also chatty, so if you’re having a hard time finding them, you can keep your eyes peeled for text bubbles that will show up, as they seem to have a lot to say.

Unlike the origami birds, finding nymphs doesn’t reward you with light cones. Instead, you get Celestial Ambrosia, which you’ll need to rank up the Tidal Bounty in the Vortex of Genesis. There are also additional puzzles that you can complete once you get the nymphs in specific areas (and we’ll detail that, too).

Below, we list where to find all nymphs in Amphoreus with both a map and a description of where to look.

Update (Jan. 28): We’ve updated this guide with further rewards for obtaining all the nymphs.

Table of Contents

  • ‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema nymph locations
  • ‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations
  • ‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations
  • ‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locations

‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema nymph locations

There are 20 nymphs total in Okhema, and they look like butterflies. Once you find all 20, you’ll get a text from Aglaea to return to the “Garmentmaker.” You’ll get Stellar Jade and Celestial Ambrosia for finding them.

After collecting all 20, the “Garmentmaker” will move near the elevator, pointing you towards a puzzle that reward you with a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Golden Journey.” You’ll need to use the fountains in Okhema to solve the nymph’s secret message.

‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Palace F2

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the “Garmentmaker.”
  2. On some flowery bushes.
  3. Blending in to the butterfly mural on the wall.
  4. At the top of the ramp on the curved structure above.

‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Palace F1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. Laying on the center water fountain.
  2. Sitting upright on a chair.
  3. Sleeping in the towels by your bath.
  4. On the edge of the stage.
  5. On the potted plant on the table. It’ll fly away to another pot and you’ll need to catch it a few times.
  6. On the walls of the lift. You may need to take it up and down a few times to grab it, but the final spot will be at the top of the lift.
  7. Hiding among the stuffed seals on the shelf.
  8. Flying above the pool.

‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Market F2

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. In the prayer fountain.
  2. In a basket on the edge of the building.

‘Eternal Holy City’ Okhema, Marmoreal Market F1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the golden wall structure.
  2. On the forge inside the smithy.
  3. High up on the pillar.
  4. Inside the dinosaur’s feeder.
  5. On the guard’s head.
  6. On the bell at the Droma’s station.

‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations

There are 20 nymphs in the “Bloodbathed Battlefront” and they’re depicted as red-orange beetles. Once you find all 20, you’ll get a text from Aglaea. For your troubles, you’ll get the “Portentous Goldwoven: Bloodbathed Battlefront” quest item, Stellar Jades, and Celestial Ambrosia.

After collecting all 20 nymphs in this area, the aforementioned quest item will give you hints about getting the precious chest for this area. You’ll need to walk forward towards the center of the round 3D room on B1 at dawn. (It’s a little fiddly, so you may need to walk a bit or try backing up and walking in again.) If done correctly, a nymph will appear, asking you a question — to which you should answer “Four warriors,” to get the chest and the “Chirping Secret: Blemish of Light” achievement.

‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos F2

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the wall in the room with the two enemies.
  2. On the edge of the walkway.
  3. On the edge of the walkway.
  4. On the wall decor.
  5. On the walls. We used a ranged character to hit the structures to reveal the critter.
  6. On top of the large sword structure in the area. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.
  7. On the ledge above the pathway.
  8. On the ground in front of the ball. We accidentally squashed it with the ball, which counted as collecting it, but we’re not sure if you have to squash it to collect it.

‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos F1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. At the entrance of the area behind the doorway to “Strife Ruins.”
  2. In the fire (ouch!).
  3. Rolling a ball up the side of the steps.
  4. On the edge of the ornamental structure.
  5. On the pile of blue cubes.
  6. On the edge of the platform.
  7. On the edge overlooking the area.
  8. By the boxes on the ground.
  9. High up on the wall. This one actually gets captured by a Spirithief.

‘Bloodbathed Battlefront’ Castrum Kremnos B1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the curved structure above the path.
  2. Sitting on the sword of the giant statue. Use the floating hand mechanism to grab it.
  3. Standing next to the hidden passage machine.

‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos nymph locations

There are 20 nymphs in the “Strife Ruins” and they appear as blue beetles. Once you find them, you’ll get Stellar Jade, the “Portentous Goldwoven: Strife Ruins” item, and Celestial Ambrosia.

Once you have all 20 nymphs, you can head to the Kremnos Arena (the northern part within the huge circle on F2), and walk forward into the arena. (Just like the Bloodbathed Battlefront instance, it may be fiddly, so you may need to try multiple times to walk in to the area.) If done correctly, a nymph will appear at the north of the map, asking you a question. Answer “13 flames” and you’ll get a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Fleetfoot Paradox.”

‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F3

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the wall.

‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F2

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. In the pile of boxes.
  2. Attack the shields on the wall to get this nymph.
  3. On the railing.
  4. On the edge of the structure.
  5. On the lip of the bowl-like decor.
  6. On the mural.

‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos F1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the wall carving.
  2. Near the rubble.
  3. Overlooking the edge of the chain bridge.
  4. On the sword in the base.
  5. On the floor.
  6. Very high up on a light fixture. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.
  7. At the top of the center structure.
  8. Next to the space anchor.

‘Strife Ruins’ Castrum Kremnos B1

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. In the fire.
  2. On the door.
  3. On the floor.
  4. On the blue light fixture.
  5. On the round structure. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.

‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locations

There are 10 nymphs in the Janusopolis and they appear as teal beetles. Once you find them all, you’ll get Stellar Jade, the “Portentous Goldwoven: Abyss of Fate” item, and Celestial Ambrosia.

After grabbing all the nymphs, the quest item you get will reveal a fourth of the puzzle solution for the tablet in the southeast corner of Janusopolis F2. Once you correctly input the solution to the “Crrk?” prophecy tablet, you’ll get a precious chest and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Many-Faced.”

‘Abyss of Fire’ Janusopolis nymph locations F2

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

  1. On the broken pillar (evernight).
  2. On the wall (evernight).
  3. On the bridge (dawn).
  4. On the edge of the path.
  5. Under the pillar on the ground.
  6. On the left scale (dawn).
  7. On the floor (dawn).
  8. In the back compartment behind the right scale on the third floor (dawn).
  9. On the top of the center part of the scales. Use the hand mechanism to grab it.
  10. In the hood of the tall statue.

After finding all the nymphs, you can return to the “Garmentmaker” in Okhema, but they won’t have any additional rewards for you at this time. They will be looking at the wall around the nearby lift, murmuring about the nymphs lining up to a hidden message, but as of this writing, we haven’t figured out what that means.
